distribution.text: Copyright 2023 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
This update for opensaml fixes the following issues:

Security issue fixed:

- CVE-2017-16853: Fix the DynamicMetadataProvider class to properly configure itself with the MetadataFilter plugins, to avoid possible MITM attacks (bsc#1068685).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.title: Terms of use

notes.text: The DynamicMetadataProvider class in saml/saml2/metadata/impl/DynamicMetadataProvider.cpp in OpenSAML-C in OpenSAML before 2.6.1 fails to properly configure itself with the MetadataFilter plugins and does not perform critical security checks such as signature verification, enforcement of validity periods, and other checks specific to deployments, aka CPPOST-105.
notes.title: Vulnerability description
